attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "I need telemetry config for monitoring intermediate system to intermediate system on Cisco IOS XR router. Use destination 10.10.10.20:57000 with tcp."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group ISIS-ISIS-INT-SYS-TO-INT-SYS
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-isis-oper:isis/instances/instance/intermediate-systems/intermediate-system
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 10.10.10.20
    port 57000
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-ISIS-INT-SYS
  sensor-group-id ISIS-ISIS-INT-SYS-TO-INT-SYS sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
